entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 6:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
